results.content:
Nice Course. It has more information than I expected. 
I have few suggestions for this course:
1. Mode of examination should be improved.(Not allowing outside the CCA tab).
2. Marking Percentage should be given for the projects by asking students to submit their apps to the tutor!
In fact, I had to complete the course in hurry. Will look into the twitter clone section later on.
Thanks a lot! I am glad learning with you "Rob Percival" Sir! :)
results.content_html:

I have few suggestions for this course:
1. Mode of examination should be improved.(Not allowing outside the CCA tab).
2. Marking Percentage should be given for the projects by asking students to submit their apps to the tutor!
In fact, I had to complete the course in hurry. Will look into the twitter clone section later on.
Thanks a lot! I am glad learning with you "Rob Percival" Sir! :)

results.content: Nice course I just don't like the way he's always mentioning the fact that we could learn anything we don't know with a quick google search everyone knows that and it makes me feel like he's not emphasizing on  some important aspects that's really worth learning and would really make things easier if we knew them.
